item.title: Who Was The Strange Man Following Her All Night?
item.description: A woman’s unsettling experience with a stranger following her all night raises questions and prompts an investigation.

media:content.media:title: Who Was The Strange Man Following Her All Night?
media:content.media:description: A woman’s unsettling experience with a stranger following her all night raises questions and prompts an investigation.

item.title: The Baffling Murder of Rose Goodman: Why Target an 80-Year-Old Woman?
item.description: Investigators examine the baffling case of Rose Goodman, an 80-year-old woman targeted in a tragic and puzzling crime.

item.title: 16-Year-Old Teen Missing For A YEAR Before Found Alive!
item.description: After being missing for a year, a 16-year-old teen is finally found alive, bringing relief and closure to family and community.

item.title: Melissa Trumpy: A Missing Mom, a Suspicious Boyfriend, and No Answers
item.description: The disappearance of Melissa Trumpy remains a mystery, with investigators examining leads including her boyfriend while seeking answers.

item.title: Lack Of Evidence Or All The Evidence They Needed?
item.description: A closer look at a case where questions remain: did investigators have enough proof to act, or was crucial evidence overlooked? Explore the facts and unanswered mysteries.

item.title: Missing Teen Survives 29 Days Of Horror...
item.description: A teenager endures 29 harrowing days after going missing, showing incredible resilience while authorities work tirelessly to bring her home safely.

item.title: Joanna Beckett: Betrayal Within a Marriage
item.description: The case of Joanna Beckett reveals how secrets and deception within a marriage led to a shocking and tragic outcome.

item.title: They Received News No Parent Wants To Hear...
item.description: A family is faced with devastating news that changes their lives forever.

item.title: Update: The Shocking Story of Elnaz Hajtamiri’s Abduction & Attack
item.description: New developments shed light on the harrowing abduction and brutal attack on Elnaz Hajtamiri, a case that continues to shock and disturb.

item.title: Parents Held Him Against His Will For 11 Days
item.description: A disturbing case unfolds as a boy is held captive by his parents for 11 days, prompting concern and investigation into his wellbeing.

item.title: Foster Father Took 12-Year-Old Adopted Daughter's Life
item.description: A foster father is found guilty in the death of his 12-year-old adopted daughter, a case that has deeply affected the community.

item.title: Family BAFFLED As Footage Shows Missing Daughter Vanishing Into Fog!
item.description: Footage shows a missing daughter walking into thick fog before disappearing, leaving her family searching for answers.

item.title: Elusive Couple Confessed During A Press Conference
item.description: An elusive couple publicly confessed during a press conference, shedding light on a long-running investigation.

item.title: Jasmine's 29 Days Of HORROR... She Thought Her Life Was Over
item.description: Over nearly a month, Jasmine faced terrifying challenges that tested her strength and hope in ways she never expected.

item.title: Online gamer helps rescue missing 4‑year‑old girl
item.description: In 2017, British gamer Harry Brown helped locate 4-year-old Yvette Henley—who was abducted by her father—by bluffing pizza delivery info until police intervened and reunited her with her grandparents.

item.title: His Missing Persons Report Wasn't Filed For 45 YEARS!
item.description: A man vanished decades ago, but his missing persons report wasn’t filed until 45 years later—raising questions about how his case went unnoticed.

item.title: Heroic Citizens Help Crack Case
item.description: When 83-year-old Glennetta, a woman with dementia, went missing, a group of neighborhood kids tracked her down by bicycle—helping police locate her and make sure she got home safely.

item.title: Fiancé Knew Something Happened To Her...
item.description: When his fiancée didn’t return, he sensed something was off. His instincts would soon lead to a deeper investigation into her disappearance.

item.title: UK woman missing from boat in US‑VI for over two years
item.description: British national Sarm Heslop vanished from a yacht off St. John in March 2021. Despite pleas for help, the boat was never fully searched, and her family now believes foul play is likely.

item.title: Teen’s discovery cracks 27-year cold case
item.description: A 13-year-old spotted a submerged car in Griffin Lake, B.C., and helped police recover the body inside. Foul play ended the 1992 disappearance of Janet Farris.
